name: Dr. Panic
intro: Match 4 or more colors vertically or horizontally to clear them. Try to eradicate all of the viruses.  Good luck!
author: Dr. D Lowe

__blocks: Dr. Panic succesfully eradicated the viruses that were causing the global pandemic.
He was awarded the Nobel Prize in medicine.
However, privately, Dr. Panic was struggling with his own problems of substance abuse, and lost his medical license after it was discovered that he was supplying himself with methamphetamines.
Be on the lookout for the sequel:  Mr. Panic- Coming Clean!
__comments: play defeat animation
